item.title: Comment on “The Misery of Diversity” by Philip Lingard
item.description:
Reading this highlights the fact that academic research papers employ language designed not to be read and understood by anyone outside a subset of academia.

This is probably important but it is written in such a way actual policy makers either cannot use it or can use it any way they want.
